verses.verse: And Naomi <WH5281> had a kinsman <WH4129> of her husband <WH376>'s, a mighty <WH1368> man <WH376> of wealth <WH2428>, of the family <WH4940> of Elimelech <WH458>, and his name <WH8034> was Boaz <WH1162>.

And Naomi <WH5281> said <WH559> unto her <WH376>, The man is nigh of kin <WH7138> unto us <WH376>, one of our near kinsmen <WH1350>.
And Ruth <WH7327> the Moabitess <WH4125> said <WH559>, Yea <WH559>, he said unto me <WH1692>, Thou shalt keep fast by my young men <WH5288>, until they have ended <WH3615> all my harvest <WH7105>.
